mean_en: a natural substance found in food that is an essential part of what humans and animals eat to help them grow and stay healthy. There are many different vitamins.
sentence: Fruits such as oranges and grapes are rich in vitamin C.
sentence_trans: 橙子、葡萄这类水果富含维生素C。
word_etyma: vita生命 + min小要素 → 生命要素 → vitamin维生素
